dev_blurb:
As a fiction and nonfiction writer, I've a background both in English and Spanish. As a Native Spanish speaker, I can write in perfect Spanish, translate from English and French into Spanish, and edit and proofread in Spanish. I hold an American BA degree in English and Literature and my English is quite close to a Native English level. 

My areas of expertise as a content writer and journalist include Literature, Culture and Politics as well as Fiction (short stories, children's writing, novels, scripts, and plays.)

Because I lived in the United States, I'm particularly fit to  deliver great creative writing in Spanish and/or English for the Hispanic/Latino audience. 

I've more than twenty books of essays and fiction published in Spanish and English and, as a writer's coach, a long experience helping authors--professionals or beginners--to improve their novels, short stories or essays.

feedback.comment: It was wonderful to work with Diana. Communication was fast and attentive to detail, and she was able to complete my translation right away. A native Spanish speaking friend of mine looked at the text and was impressed with how well it was written. I'm very happy and would definitely hire her again for future jobs.

feedback.comment:
Diana is a real professional to work with. She proofread and edited the Spanish translation of my book.  Diana was timely, accurate, and attentive to the nuance of meaning and voice of the writing. She was careful to ask questions in the transcript as we corresponded back and forth to learn the important meanings to convey, and what to ignore.  Once she was sure she understood what I wanted, she could work autonomously. 

I would definitely hire her again for any Spanish translation work.

tsexam.ts_name_raw: oDesk Readiness Test for Independent Contractors and Staffing Managers
Online Article Writing and Blogging Test (U.S. Version)

dev_timezone: UTC-03:00 E Argentina (BA, DF, SC, TF)

portfolio_items_v.pi_title: Role of Theatre in Child Development
EN EL CAMPO by Julian del Casal

skill.skl_description: An article is a written work published in a print or electronic medium. It may be for the purpose of propagating the news, research results, academic analysis or debate.
A blog is a personal journal published on the World Wide Web consisting of discrete entries ("posts") typically displayed in reverse chronological order so the most recent post appears first.

Professional writing involves the use of clear language to convey information in a way that is easily understood by the intended audience. Individuals who can use language well may be employed as full-time professional writers in a variety of communications-related occupations, such as

Creative writing is considered to be any writing, fiction, poetry, or non-fiction, that goes outside the bounds of normal professional, journalistic, academic, and technical forms of literature. Works which fall into this category include novels, epics, short stories, and poems.
English is a West Germanic language that was first spoken in early medieval England and is now a global lingua franca.
Fiction writing is the composition of not factual texts. Fictional writing often is produced as a story meant to entertain or convey an author's point of view.

A short story is a work of fiction that is usually written in prose, often in narrative format. This format tends to be more pointed than longer works of fiction, such as novellas (in the 20th and 21st century sense) and novels.

Spanish (espaol) is a Romance language named for its origins as the native tongue of a large proportion of the inhabitants of Spain. Spanish is the second most natively spoken language in the world, after Mandarin Chinese.
Translation is the communication of the meaning of a source-language text by means of an equivalent target-language text.

dev_profile_title: English and Spanish Creative Writer and Literary Translator

experience.exp_comment:
More than 20 books--novels, short story collections and essays--published at Catálogos Editora (Spanish/Argentina) and on  Amazon Kindle (English & Spanish)

Amazon Author's Page:
http://www.amazon.com/Diana-Ferraro/e/B001JXBTXE

Contributor to political and cultural magazines.

Contributor to women's magazines (among them, the Argentine Vogue-1979-1981)

ag_description:
Professional Services with Char offers a Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) model that helps your company to be more efficient. Our team will assist in the difficult ancillary tasks associated with running a business. We specialize in Copywriting, Process Design, Business Documentation, Business Plans, Web & Mobile Development, and Education for companies working in Marijuana/Cannabis, Retail, Manufacturing, Distribution, and Healthcare.

Learn more here: https://www.charlenaberry.com/southflorida-business-planning
dev_blurb:
Charlena Berry offers Professional Business Services on behalf of the Cannabis Industry.  Located in Boca Raton, Florida, she provides consulting, documentation, and business strategy services to clients pursuing entry into the cannabis business in the State of Florida or Michigan.  Her experience spans from writing Marijuana Business Plans for Commercial Cultivation Facilities, Processing Centers, and Dispensaries. Additionally, she has experience operating a Medical Marijuana Endorsement Clinic in the State of Michigan where it has been legal since 2008.  

Prior to entering the cannabis industry, Ms. Berry worked at Fortune 500 manufacturing and retail companies Whirlpool Corporation and Office Depot Corporation.  Some of her career highlights include planning and executing large scale merger efforts to transition Point of Sales systems. She was an Omni-Channel sales manager overseeing over $300M in eCommerce/retail business, and she designed new processes for manufacturing and inventory planning in the consumer goods space.

A Southwest Michigan native, she holds a Master's Degree in Supply Chain Management from Michigan State University. She is passionate about helping form the processes and procedures that will shape the future of the Cannabis industry. She specializes in writing Marijuana Business Plans, researching local policies required for licensure, writing Marijuna Inventory Control Documents, Security Plans, Dispensary Operating Procedures, Cultivation Operating Procedures, and any other document that may be required for your state application. Her cannabis consulting services are available in Florida or Michigan.

institution.ed_comment: Michigan State has the best Supply Chain Program in the country! I had the opportunity to study inventory, logistics, and procurement with some of the finest minds in the country!

job.as_opening_title: Collect email addresses for all legal marijuana government regulatory bodies in the US
Project for Char

feedback.comment: Charlena was very prompt and professional. Delays were on our end. But she was very patient. I would also say her strength is organization as she was very detailed when it came to laying who and what she needed to complete the work. I would definitely recommend her.

job.as_opening_title: Research information in 4 online stores

skill.skl_description: Business process management (BPM) is a field in operations management that focuses on improving corporate performance by managing and optimizing a company's business processes.

Business analysis is the discipline of identifying business needs and determining solutions to business problems. Solutions often include a systems development component, but may also consist of process improvement, organizational change or strategic planning and policy development.

"A business plan is a formal statement of a set of business goals, the reasons why they are believed attainable, and the plan for reaching those goals. It may also contain background information about the organization or team attempting to reach those goals."

Legal research is "the process of identifying and retrieving information necessary to support legal decision-making. In its broadest sense, legal research includes each step of a course of action that begins with an analysis of the facts of a problem and concludes with the application and
Market research is any organized effort to gather information about markets or customers. It is a very important component of business strategy.

A policy is typically described as a principle or rule to guide decisions and achieve rational outcome(s). The term is not normally used to denote what is actually done, this is normally referred to as either procedure or protocol.

Requirements analysis in systems engineering and software engineering, encompasses those tasks that go into determining the needs or conditions to meet for a new or altered product, taking account of the possibly conflicting requirements of the various stakeholders, such as beneficiaries or
A stored procedure is a subroutine available to applications that access a relational database system.

Technical writing, a form of technical communication, is a style of writing used in fields as diverse as computer hardware and software, engineering, chemistry, the aerospace industry, robotics, finance, consumer electronics, and biotechnology.
Web design is the process of planning and creating a website. Text, images, digital media and interactive elements are used by web designers to produce the page seen on the web browser.

ag_description:
With over a decade of design and implementation experience, Essendis is your premier partner for technology solutions. Our team of certified infrastructure experts craft optimized solutions that will meet the most demanding business needs using proven approaches to make sure the job is done right. Essendis  specializes in: 

- .NET Development 
- Microsoft Windows Infrastructure
- Hyper-V/VMware
- Remote Desktop Services/Citrix
- Microsoft System Center/IBM BigFix 
- Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity
- Office 365 
- Public Cloud Migration 
- Private Cloud Implementation  
- Purpose-Built Hardware Configuration
- VoIP and Hosted PBX
- Managed Services
dev_blurb:
Jim is a proven leader with experience delivering high-quality services to clients in the areas of Cybersecurity, Compliance, Infrastructure and Development and is an expert on SOX 404, SSAE 18, PCI-DSS, HIPAA, CJIS and FedRAMP requirements.  A Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) and Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP), Jim has demonstrated a deep understanding of Information Technology and Corporate Governance.  

Jim's experience with Big4 and Fortune 500 organizations shows that he understands the expectations of even the most demanding clients and that he possesses both the talent and professionalism to help your team reach its goals.  A highly coachable team player, Jim will add value to your team whether utilized as a team lead, team member or subject matter expert.  

Jim has experience working with Chinese, French, German, Belgian and Indian colleagues both on-site and remotely.  Jim is a current resident of the United States and a native english speaker.

skill.skl_description: The general definition of an audit is a planned and documented activity performed by qualified personnel to determine by investigation, examination, or evaluation of objective evidence, the adequacy and compliance with established procedures, or applicable documents, and the effectiveness of implementation.

Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is an independent information security certification governed by the International Information Systems Security Certification Consortium, also known as (ISC).

Governance refers to all of processes of governing, whether undertaken by a government, market or network, whether over a family, tribe, formal or informal organization or territory and whether through the laws, norms, power or language.
The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 was enacted by the United States in 1996.

Information security, sometimes shortened to InfoSec, is the practice of defending information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, perusal, inspection, recording or destruction.

Internal control, as defined in accounting and auditing, is a process for assuring achievement of an organization's objectives in operational effectiveness and efficiency, reliable financial reporting, and compliance with laws, regulations and policies.

The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is an information security standard for organizations that handle cardholder information for the major debit, credit, prepaid, e-purse, ATM, and POS cards.
A penetration test, occasionally pentest, is a method of evaluating the security of a computer system or network by simulating an attack from malicious outsiders and malicious insiders.

Risk management is the identification, assessment, and prioritization of risks followed by coordinated and economical application of resources to minimize, monitor, and control the probability and/or impact of unfortunate events or to maximize the realization of opportunities.
A vulnerability assessment is the process of identifying, quantifying, and prioritizing (or ranking) the vulnerabilities in a system.

skill.skl_description: Agile software development is a group of software development methods based on iterative and incremental development, where requirements and solutions evolve through collaboration between self-organizing, cross-functional teams.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of remote computing services (also called web services) that together make up a cloud computing platform, offered over the Internet by Amazon.com. The most central and well-known of these services are Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3.

AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.
DevOps platform fo automating IT infrastructure and applications to drive self-reliance across development and operations teams.

GitHub is a web-based hosting service for software development projects that use the Git revision control system. GitHub offers both commercial plans and free accounts for open source projects. According to the Git User's Survey in 2009, GitHub is the most popular Git hosting site.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
Jenkins, previously known as Hudson, is an open source continuous integration tool written in Java.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).

skill.skl_description: Business English is English language especially related to international trade. It is a part of English for Specific Purposes and can be considered a specialism within English language learning and teaching; for example, the teachers' organisation IATEFL has a special interest group called BESIG
Copywriting is the use of words and ideas to promote a person, business, opinion or idea.
A creative strategy generally explains how an advertising campaign will meet the advertising objectives of the business.

Creative writing is considered to be any writing, fiction, poetry, or non-fiction, that goes outside the bounds of normal professional, journalistic, academic, and technical forms of literature. Works which fall into this category include novels, epics, short stories, and poems.
Email marketing is directly marketing a commercial message to a group of people using electronic mail email.

A prospectus is a document that describes a financial security for potential buyers. A prospectus commonly provides investors with material information about mutual funds, stocks, bonds and other investments, such as a description of the company's business, financial statements, biographies of...
SEO content is any content created with the goal of attracting search engine traffic.

experience.exp_comment: Experience in creating marketing materials and information memorandums for businesses in a variety of industries while working in the field of investment banking. The work not only required a sophisticated level of writing skill but also the ability to quickly learn specifics of very niche businesses in order to effectively communicate the value-added proposition that each of these opportunities could offer to a potential investor. The range of companies that I have written about include but are not limited to the following industries: construction, IT, transportation, banking, food distribution, pharmaceutical, and media. In addition to the more technical writing, I also have extensive experience in business writing which involves interacting with clients and also generating leads and developing relationships.
